item.title: Musings #2
item.description: Oh man, did I skip a beat or what? I had thought that I would be regular in writing these but I have been shit lately.

item.title: Musings #1
item.description: It’s been a while since I have acquired this domain and thought about consistent writing. But, I kept procrastinating. I always felt what exactly should I write, and as I am queering my career in tech, I have plenty to express and write about now.

item.title: Thoughts
item.description: Everything I want but don’t have, and everything I have but don’t want, is because I lack knowledge. “The cosmos is within us.

item.title: Create new Google Doc from the search bar
item.description: TIL, you can create new doc, sheet, slide, form, site or a calendar event from the search bar at the top of the Chrome.

item.title: DFS?
item.description: I have always struggled with Depth First Search, DFS. I now have started solving it using first principles and it has started to make sense.

item.title: How to find good research papers?
item.description: There is plethora of research happening all around us and in the recent times the incoming number of research papers have increased by quite a number.

item.title: Links
item.description: My favorite links to some of the good posts i have read around the internet. My links keeping up with ai Favorite links teach yourself programming in 10 years Patrick Collision | patrickc

item.title: Papers
item.description: The papers I am reading and I recommend. The list contains papers extensively from the fields of Physics, Machine Learning / Deep Learning and Software Engineering.

item.title: The AI Summer
item.description: Meta LLaMA, Stanford Alpaca, PaLM, OpenAI GPT-4. This week has been crazy. The previous week started with the storming LLaMA release from the Meta which advanced to weight leaks on the torrent.

item.title: Hello, World
item.description: Hello, World #include <iostream> using namespace std; int main() { cout << "Hello, World!" << endl; return 0; }

item.title: Today I Learned
item.description: Whatever I end up learning on my day to day exploration. If it seem interesting to me I will share it as a post here.

item.description: Hardware, services and tools I am using to get things done. Starting with my dream setup which I found on r/battlestations.

item.title: Bookshelf
item.description: This will be interesting to some people, who want to read some great books and don’t know where to start from.

item.title: About
item.description: ipa nezubn /nɛzʌb/ — no meaning, i made it up an engineer, and a polymath Hi, I am Ankit aka (nezubn) and I have been working in Machine Learning and Engineering for almost ~5 years.

item.title: Now
item.description: What I am doing now? Work I am working as a Machine Learning Engineer in a startup, OnionDev Tech (Gramvaani). My work involves around writing Django Apps to training and deploying Machine Learning models.

item.title: People
item.description: Internet people who write about a variety of topics. I have tried to make this list of people sorted based on their expertise in their respective fields.
